name: react-starter
description: boilerplate project template for: browserify, npm-css, react, and phonegap

scripts.test: npm run before-test && node node_modules/prova/bin/prova test/* && npm run after-test
scripts.build: npm run js && npm run css && npm run html
scripts.watch: node node_modules/watchy/bin/watchy -w src -- npm run build
scripts.serve: npm run watch & node node_modules/phonegap/bin/phonegap serve

author: Brian LeRoux
